00041 {

00049 enum PTEID_DocumentType
00050 {
00051         PTEID_DOCTYPE_FULL=0,            /**< Full document : usefull for XML/CSV/TLV export */
00052         PTEID_DOCTYPE_ID,                        /**< ID document : usefull to get value by field */
00053         PTEID_DOCTYPE_PICTURE,           /**< picture document (if available) */
00054         PTEID_DOCTYPE_INFO,                      /**< info on the card (if available) */
00055         PTEID_DOCTYPE_PINS,                      /**< pins containert (if available) */
00056         PTEID_DOCTYPE_CERTIFICATES       /**< certificates containert (if available) */
00057 };

00095 enum PTEID_CertifStatus
00096 {
00097         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_UNKNOWN=0,           /**< Validity unknown */
00098         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_REVOKED,             /**< Revoked certificate */
00099         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_TEST,                /**< Test certificate */
00100         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_DATE,                /**< Certificate no more valid */
00101         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_CONNECT,             /**< Connection problem */
00102         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_ISSUER,              /**< An issuer is missing in the chain */
00103         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_ERROR,               /**< Error during validation */
00104         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID,               /**< Valid certificate */
00105         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID_CRL,           /**< Valid certificate through CRL process */
00106         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_VALID_OCSP,          /**< Valid certificate through OCSP process */
00107         PTEID_CERTIF_STATUS_OCSP_NOT_CHECKED     /**< OCSP was not performed */
00108 };
00109

00141 enum PTEID_Param
00142 {
00143         //GENERAL
00144         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_INSTALLDIR,          //string, directory of the basic eid software; “c:/Program Files/pteid/”
00145         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_INSTALL_PRO_DIR,             //string, directory of the pro eid software; “c:/Program Files/pteid/”
00146         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_INSTALL_SDK_DIR,             //string, directory of the sdk eid software; “c:/Program Files/pteid/”
00147         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_CACHEDIR,            //string, cache directory for card-file;
00148         PTEID_PARAM_GENERAL_LANGUAGE,            //string, user language: fr, nl, en, de, …
00149 
00150         //LOGGING
00151         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_DIRNAME,                     //string, location of the log-file; $home/pteid/ Full path with volume name.
00152         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_PREFIX,                      //string, prefix of the log files
00153         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_FILENUMBER,          //number, Maximum number of log-files; 3
00154         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_FILESIZE,            //number, Maximum number of log-files; 3
00155         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_LEVEL,                       //string, Specify what should be logged; critical, error, warning, info or debug
00156         PTEID_PARAM_LOGGING_GROUP,                       //number; 0=no (default), 1=yes (create on log file by module)
00157 
00158         //CRL
00159         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_SERVDOWNLOADNR,          //number
00160         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_TIMEOUT,                         //number, timeout in seconds
00161         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_CACHEDIR,                        //string
00162         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_CACHEFILE,                       //string        “$common/crl/
00163         PTEID_PARAM_CRL_LOCKFILE,                        //string
00164 
00165         //CERTIFIACTE VALIDATION
00166         PTEID_PARAM_CERTVALID_ALLOWTESTC,        //number; 0=no, 1=yes
00167         PTEID_PARAM_CERTVALID_CRL,                       //number; 0=no, 1=optional, 2=always
00168         PTEID_PARAM_CERTVALID_OCSP,                      //number; 0=no, 1=optional, 2=always
00169 
00170         //CERTIFICATE CACHE
00171         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_CACHEFILE,         //string;
00172         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_LINENUMB,          //number
00173         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_VALIDITY,          //number
00174         PTEID_PARAM_CERTCACHE_WAITDELAY,         //number
00175 
00176         //PROXY
00177         PTEID_PARAM_PROXY_HOST,                          //string;
00178         PTEID_PARAM_PROXY_PORT,                          //number
00179         PTEID_PARAM_PROXY_PACFILE,                       //string
00180 
00181         //SECURITY
00182         PTEID_PARAM_SECURITY_SINGLESIGNON,       //number; 0=no, 1=yes; If yes, the PIN is requested by the driver and asked only once with multiple applications.
00183 
00184         //GUITOOL
00185         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_STARTWIN,            //number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00186         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_STARTMINI,           //number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00187         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_SHOWPIC,                     //number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00188         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_SHOWTBAR,            //number; 0=no, 1=yes
00189         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_VIRTUALKBD,          //number; 0=no, 1=yes
00190         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_AUTOCARDREAD,        //number; 0=no, 1=yes(default)
00191         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_CARDREADNUMB,        //number; -1(not specified), 0-10
00192         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_REGCERTIF,           //number; 0=no, 1=yes(default)
00193         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_REMOVECERTIF,        //number; 0=no, 1=yes(default)
00194         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_FILESAVE,            //string; path to directory where to save eid/xml/csv file
00195 
00196         //XSIGN
00197         PTEID_PARAM_XSIGN_TSAURL,                        //string;
00198         PTEID_PARAM_XSIGN_ONLINE,                        //number
00199         PTEID_PARAM_XSIGN_WORKINGDIR,            //string;
00200         PTEID_PARAM_XSIGN_TIMEOUT,                       //number
00201 
00202         //GUITOOL
00203         PTEID_PARAM_GUITOOL_SHOWNOTIFICATION,//number; 0=no(default), 1=yes
00204 
00205         //PROXY
00206         PTEID_PARAM_PROXY_CONNECT_TIMEOUT,       //number
00207 
00208 };
